class_notes: (Lab Fee of $125.  Must attend two 3-hour training workshops outside of class - days/times TBD)
course_description: Hands-on introduction to technical and stylistic foundations of moving image production using a variety of film and video formats and to the economic and professional realities of narrative content creation for film.
prerequisites: FILM 107 or FILM_OX 107 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
